title: Mareva Malt Mavericks' Macallan Harmony Collection Tasting

content.raw: On May 4th, 2023, the Mareva Malt Mavericks gathered at Club Mareva Beirut's cigar lounge for an unforgettable evening of whisky appreciation, expert insights, and camaraderie. The exclusive double tasting featured two exceptional whiskies from the renowned Macallan Distillery's Harmony Collection: the Macallan Harmony Rich Cacao and Macallan Harmony Smooth Arabica. With a full house of whisky enthusiasts in attendance, the event was a resounding success. The star of the evening, Jean-Paul Abdallah, brought his extensive knowledge and passion for whisky to the forefront as he led attendees through a captivating presentation. His expertise and engaging storytelling brought the Macallan Harmony Collection to life, allowing everyone to fully appreciate the nuances of these two remarkable whiskies. To further enhance the tasting experience, Jean-Paul generously provided all attendees with detailed tasting notes and a comprehensive wheel of taste. This invaluable resource allowed participants to better understand the intricate flavors and aromas of the Macallan Harmony Rich Cacao and Macallan Harmony Smooth Arabica, while also serving as a lasting memento of this special evening. Macallan Harmony Rich Cacao enchanted guests with its enticing blend of dark chocolate, cinnamon, and dried fruits on the nose. The velvety chocolate, warm spices, and subtle hints of dried fruit on the palate left attendees eager to explore this rich and indulgent single malt even further. Macallan Harmony Smooth Arabica, inspired by the smoothness of the finest Arabica coffee, showcased Macallan's craftsmanship in creating a delicate balance of flavors. Guests were captivated by the enticing notes of roasted coffee beans, vanilla, and soft fruits on the nose, and delighted in the harmonious blend of smooth coffee, creamy vanilla, and a touch of citrus on the palate. The full house of attendees not only enjoyed the exquisite whiskies and Jean-Paul's amazing presentation, but also cherished the opportunity to connect with like-minded individuals who share a passion for the art of whisky tasting. The warm and convivial atmosphere of Club Mareva Beirut's cigar lounge provided the perfect backdrop for this memorable event. As the evening came to a close, the Mareva Malt Mavericks left with a deeper appreciation for the Macallan Harmony Collection, fond memories of a night spent in the company of fellow whisky lovers, and invaluable tasting notes and wheels of taste to guide their future whisky adventures. The success of this event has undoubtedly left everyone eagerly anticipating the next gathering. Stay tuned for updates on future Mareva Malt Mavericks events, and join us in celebrating the fascinating world of malt whisky. Cheers! ðŸ¥ƒ
